uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.oxpath.output

Class ACustomOutputHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.oxpath.output.ACustomOutputHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAbstractOutputHandler, IOutputHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AAdvancedCustomOutputHandler, JsonOutputHandler, NodeOutputHandler, RecStreamOutputHandler, RelationOutputHandler, SimpleConsoleOutputHandler, XMLOutputHandler

    public abstract class ACustomOutputHandler
extends Object
implements IOutputHandler
    This class implements basic functionality for handling the OXPath output and can be sub-classed by specific implementations, processing OXPathExtractionNode.
    Author:
    Giovanni Grasso , Ruslan Fayzrakhmanov

      • processNode

        public void processNode(OXPathExtractionNode node)
        Description copied from interface: IAbstractOutputHandler
        The OXPath engine invokes this method to output extraction nodes. The first node is <result> node, the root. The last node is the "end node".
        Specified by:
        processNode in interface IAbstractOutputHandler
